section.name: Struts Tutorials
section.p: Introduction to MVC and the Jakarta Struts Framework (online presentation), Craig Tataryn -- http://www.us-eh.com/craiger/articles/struts/
Struts, an open-source MVC implementation, Malcom Davis -- http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/library/j-struts/?n-j-2151
Strut Your Stuff With JSP Tags, Thor Kristmundsson -- http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-12-2000/jw-1201-struts.html
Using the Struts Framework to Develop a Message Board, Maneesh Sahu -- Author's Page (article requires registration with informit.com)
Welcome to the Struts Framework, Bluestone Software -- http://developer.bluestone.com/scripts/SaISAPI.dll/Gallery.class/demos/trailMaps/index.jsp
About Struts, Husted dot Com -- http://www.husted.com/about/struts/
